description: CONTINUED USE OF CAR PARK AS A SUNDAY MARKET
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The market hereby permitted shall only trade on Sundays between 09.00 and 14.00 hours.  Reason for condition: To ensure that the amenities of the area are not adversely affected.

Condition : 2 - During the hours of operation of the market hereby permitted, the parking spaces for traders' and customers' vehicles, as indicated on Drawing No. 385 WS 1, shall be laid out and be made permanently available for use.  Reason for condition: To ensure that the use should not result in unacceptable levels of on-street parking in the vicinity of the site.

Condition : 3 - During the hours of operation of the market, signs shall be displayed at the points of exit onto Plough Lane, indicating that vehicles should not leave the site by means of a right-hand turn.  Reason for condition: In the interests of highway safety.

Condition : 4 - No amplified music shall be played or announcements made through loud speakers, in conjunction with the use hereby permitted.  Reason for condition: To ensure that the amenities of the area are not adversely affected.

Condition : 5 - The use hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the land reinstated to its former condition on or before 31st March 1993.  Reason for condition: To enable the Local Planning Authority to review the acceptability of the use at the expiration of this limited period having regard to its effects on highway conditions and residential amenities in the area.
